name: An Apocalypse Game Demo
description:
A rough demo for my game about Digital Apocalypse.

One day, you want to try something new, and downloaded a short-video based social networking app.

You get to know someone and became successful in the digital world. But as you immersed deeper to this community, you realize something not that fancy under the screen, and are faced with new choices.

The door is right there. Are you going to open it?
